banner.title: Government Procurement Services
banner.desc: Our procurement center brings multidisciplinary teams with deep experience across research, education, healthcare, water treatment, broadcasting, telecom, internet, IC, electronics, and advanced equipment manufacturing. We partner closely with leading institutions and have exceeded RMB 35B in procurement volume by 2024.

sections.title:

sections.desc: End-to-end solutions from needs analysis to delivery, streamlining processes while ensuring quality and compliance for reagents, consumables, equipment, software, and consulting.
